body_html:
• OS Platform and Distribution (I have OS in original report)
    Linux apopov-desktop 4.13.0-36-generic #40-Ubuntu SMP Fri Feb 16 20:07:48 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
  • TensorFlow installed from lib https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/libtensorflow/libtensorflow-cpu-linux-x86_64-1.6.0.tar.gz using this doc https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_c
  • TensorFlow version 1.5.0
  • Bazel version - I do not use Bazel
  • CUDA/cuDNN version - running on CPU and use CPU only lib
  • Exact command to reproduce(It is also in original report):
    1. Write code from section Source code
    2. Compile it gcc -g -I/usr/local/include -L/usr/local/lib hello_tf.c -ltensorflow -o memtest
    3. Run under valgrind valgrind --leak-check=full ./memtest
    4. Look to the report

OS Platform and Distribution (I have OS in original report)
Linux apopov-desktop 4.13.0-36-generic #40-Ubuntu SMP Fri Feb 16 20:07:48 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
TensorFlow installed from lib https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/libtensorflow/libtensorflow-cpu-linux-x86_64-1.6.0.tar.gz using this doc https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_c
TensorFlow version 1.5.0
Bazel version - I do not use Bazel
CUDA/cuDNN version - running on CPU and use CPU only lib
Exact command to reproduce(It is also in original report):

Write code from section Source code
Compile it gcc -g -I/usr/local/include -L/usr/local/lib hello_tf.c -ltensorflow -o memtest
Run under valgrind valgrind --leak-check=full ./memtest
Look to the report
body:
* OS Platform and Distribution (I have OS in original report)
`Linux apopov-desktop 4.13.0-36-generic #40-Ubuntu SMP Fri Feb 16 20:07:48 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux`
* TensorFlow installed from lib https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/libtensorflow/libtensorflow-cpu-linux-x86_64-1.6.0.tar.gz using this doc https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_c
* TensorFlow version 1.5.0
* Bazel version - I do not use Bazel
* CUDA/cuDNN version - running on CPU and use CPU only lib
* Exact command to reproduce(It is also in original report): 
   1. Write code from section `Source code`
   2. Compile it `gcc -g -I/usr/local/include -L/usr/local/lib hello_tf.c -ltensorflow -o memtest`
   3. Run under valgrind `valgrind --leak-check=full ./memtest`
   4. Look to the report
